text: Group D of the 2014 FIFA World Cup had the following teams Uruguay, Costa Rica, England, and Italy. ==Standings== *Costa Rica advanced to play Greece (runner-up of Group C) in the round of 16. *Uruguay advanced to play Colombia (winner of Group C) in the round of 16. ==Games== ===Uruguay vs Costa Rica=== {| style="font-size:90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" GK 1 Fernando Muslera RB 16
